meanings.definition: Of or relating to a style of writing in which the letters are formed with rounded strokes and are often connected
meanings.sent1: The uncially written note was elegant and easy to read.
meanings.sent2: The uncially penned invitation looked beautiful and traditional.
meanings.sent3: The uncially crafted birthday card brought a touch of old-world charm.
meanings.sent4: Her uncially handwriting danced across the page like a graceful swan.
meanings.sent5: The uncially style of calligraphy made the wedding invitations stand out.

meanings.sent1: The document was uncially written, giving it a classic feel.
meanings.sent2: The uncially inscribed stone tablet held ancient secrets.
meanings.sent3: His uncially penned love letter was a romantic gesture.
meanings.sent4: The uncially engraved ring bore a special message.
meanings.sent5: The uncially written poem captured the essence of the past.

meanings.definition: A manuscript written in uncial script
meanings.sent1: The uncially was a valuable addition to the library's collection.
meanings.sent2: The historian studied the uncially to learn about ancient writing styles.
meanings.sent3: The uncially revealed insights into the past civilization.
meanings.sent4: The uncially contained historical records of great significance.
meanings.sent5: The uncially manuscript was carefully preserved for future generations.
